telephony_service_fax_custom_domains_inf:
The Ecofax White-Label domains allow you to send faxes using the Ecofax service via your own domain name.
You can send a fax using an email address such as 0102030405@mycompany.com.
The domain you enter must have an MX 1 record to mail.ecofax.fr.
telephony_service_fax_custom_domains_con: Oops! An error occurred while adding your domain.
Oops! An error occurred while deleting your domain.
telephony_service_fax_custom_domains_err: Oops! An error occurred while loading your Ecofax White-Label domains.
